content: drops christmas crochet drops christmas tree star with lace pattern in belle drops extra 0-1208 drops design pattern no vs-006 yarn group b measurements approx 20 x 20 cm / 8 x 8 materials drops belle from garnstudio 100 g color no 03 light beige drops crochet hook size 3 5 mm/e/4 or size needed to get 20 double_crochet x 10 row = 4 x 4 10 x 10 cm accessories some poly stuffing for filling first work 1 interior holster then 2 stars work all pieces decrease on last round then fill top star with poly stuffing uk version 1 1 http //www garnstudio com/pattern php id=7293&cid=19
